content:
> Performed by only the most skilled, a Lucky Barry is a crap where bog roll is only required for posterity. In essence it's the perfect crap with no mess. Handy when attempting to take a crap in the woods.

"There was no bog roll in the shitter, thank God it was a Lucky Barry."

[TIL: Lucky Barry](https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Lucky+Barry).
